info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Convert a dimension index into a table id.
[Parameters] - id : dimension id. - binary count list : binary array of long long counters representing block dimensions. - block size : product of the dimensions that vary more quickly than the dimension to be reduced.
[Return type] Long-long.
[Examples] Convert index of the most inner dimension into the related id_dim; 'size' is a binary long long paramter set to dimension size. oph_id3(index,'size',1)
